FUTURE REACH TEXT: By aligning strategic insight with market potential, we convert investment opportunities into profitable ventures that generate strong financial returns and contribute meaningfully to economic advancement.

OUR MISSION TEXT: Our mission is to lead in delivering innovative architectural and sustainable solutions, driven by a visionary team committed to shaping and enriching the architectural landscape of Saudi Arabia.
OUR VISION TEXT: Our vision is to deliver solutions that are both innovative and practical, positioning ourselves as an engineering firm of choice, a leader in the industry, and a trusted, invaluable partner to our clients.
aboutText1: Noon Consultants, a division of Noon Engineering Services, is a prominent urban planning, architecture, and interior design practice based in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Founded in 2011, Noon is committed to designing and adapting solutions that respond thoughtfully to the unique context of each project, with a focus on creating intelligent and enduring urban planning and design.
aboutText2: Our success is primarily attributed to the exceptional caliber of our team and their ability to deliver high-quality designs that thoughtfully integrate social, environmental, and economic considerations, ensuring holistic and sustainable outcomes.
aboutText3: Our objective is to continuously evolve as a design practice, consistently seeking innovative solutions to conventional challenges while delivering the highest standard of service to our clients and the wider community
aboutText4: “We, as noon, are a professional engineering services firm that                 engages in urban, architectural design, supervision, interior                 design, project management as well as related research, planning                 and consultancy activities.
aboutText5: Our firm provides solutions that are both creative and feasible.                 Our goal is to continue to strive as a team of professionals to                 guarantee our unwavering commitment to value and quality that                 satisfies our clients.”
address1: Riyadh, Saudi Arabia Olaya St, Al Wurud District
address2: Al-Madinah, Saudi Arabia Abdusalam Ibn Hafes St, Al Iskan District

careers.applyText: Ready to join our team? Send your application to careers@noonconsultants.com with the position title in the subject line.

culture.description: Join a team of creative professionals who value collaboration and innovation.
culture.title: Collaborative Culture

growth.description: Continuous learning opportunities and career advancement in a supportive environment.
growth.title: Professional Growth

impact.description: Contribute to shaping the urban landscape and architectural heritage of the Kingdom.
impact.title: Make an Impact

projects.description: Work on cutting-edge architectural and urban planning projects across Saudi Arabia.
projects.title: Innovative Projects

careers.description: At Noon Consultants, we believe that great design comes from great people. We're always looking for talented individuals who are passionate about architecture, urban planning, and design to join our dynamic team.

architect.description: We are seeking a talented Senior Architect to lead design projects and mentor junior team members.
requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Architecture
5+ years of experience in architectural design
Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, and SketchUp
Strong design and visualization skills
Experience with Saudi building codes and regulations
architect.title: Senior Architect

interiorDesigner.description: Create inspiring interior spaces that blend functionality with aesthetic excellence.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Interior Design
2+ years of experience in interior design
Proficiency in design software (3D Max, Photoshop, etc.)
Strong sense of color, texture, and space
Portfolio showcasing completed projects
interiorDesigner.title: Interior Designer

projectManager.description: Lead and coordinate architectural and engineering projects from conception to completion.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Architecture
PMP certification preferred
5+ years of project management experience
Strong leadership and communication skills
Experience with construction and design projects
projectManager.title: Project Manager

urbanPlanner.description: Join our urban planning team to create sustainable and innovative urban development solutions.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Urban Planning or related field
3+ years of experience in urban planning
Knowledge of GIS software and planning tools
Understanding of sustainable development principles
Excellent analytical and communication skills
urbanPlanner.title: Urban Planner

apply.description: Send us your resume, portfolio, and cover letter through our online portal.

clientText1: The architectural drawings provided by the team were exceptionally detailed and innovative. Their expertise transformed our vision into reality

mainText: Noon Consultants is one of the leading architectural firms in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
pricing for all services is in saudi riy: pricing for all services is in saudi riyals.

projects.breif: Over the years, we have partnered with a wide range of organizations across Saudi Arabia, earning a reputation for excellence and reliability. Each project has contributed to the deep, specialized knowledge we bring to every new challenge. Our portfolio is delivered by seasoned professionals with extensive industry experience, each bringing focused expertise across key functional areas. We are committed to providing high-quality, client-focused solutions that support the sustainable, innovative, and long-term success of every project we undertake.
projects.copy rights: all renders is back to noon copyrights.
projects.description: For years we have worked with organizations around Saudi Arabia. We are proud of the work we have done, and the unique depth of knowledge it has allowed us to build. Are Delivered By Seasoned Professionals With Extensive Industry Expertise, Each Specializing In Focused Functional Areas. Committed To Delivering High-Quality Services That Understand Our Clients' Needs, Contribute To The Sustainable And Innovative Success Of Their Projects..

servicess.breif: Over the years, we have proudly served a wide range of clients throughout Saudi Arabia, building a reputation for technical excellence and client-centric solutions. Our services are delivered by experts with in-depth knowledge across various engineering disciplines, each committed to delivering value-driven, high-performance outcomes. We focus on innovation, sustainability, and precision to support the long-term success of our clients’ projects.
servicess.service-1-description: The art and science of creating buildings and ther physical structures. It involves the careful consideration of aesthetics, functionality, and the environment.

service-1-features.4: Value Engineering and Bill of Materials

servicess.service-10-description: The art and science of enhancing the interior of a space to create a more aesthetically pleasing and functional environment. It involves designing the layout, selecting furnishings and finishes, coordinating color schemes ,lighting
servicess.service-11-description: The discipline of planning, organizing, and overseeing the completion of a project to achieve specific goals and meet specific success criteria. It involves managing resources, time, and scope to deliver the project on time, within budget, required quality standards.
servicess.service-12-description: The licensed architect responsible for the legal and professional aspects of a project. This role involves overseeing the design and documentation to ensure that the project complies with local building codes, regulations, and standards.
servicess.service-2-description: Urban design is the process of shaping the physical setting for life in cities, towns, and villages. It involves the arrangement, appearance, and functionality of urban spaces, including the design of buildings, streets, parks, and other public spaces.
servicess.service-3-description: Is a comprehensive, long-term planning process that provides a blueprint for the physical, economic, and social development of a particular area, such as a city, neighborhood, or large-scale development project.
servicess.service-4-description: the process of overseeing the construction phase of a project to ensure that it is completed on time, within budget, and according to the specified standards and plans. It involves managing various aspects of the construction process.
servicess.service-5-description: The process of obtaining official permission or certification to practice as a professional in these fields. It ensures that individuals meet specific educational, professional, ethical standards to safeguard public health, safety, and welfare.
servicess.service-6-description: Detailed documents that present technical information, findings, analysis, and recommendations related to engineering projects. These reports are essential for communicating complex information clearly and effectively.
servicess.service-7-description: To improve the value of a project by analyzing its functions. The goal is to enhance the project's performance, quality, and reliability while minimizing costs. It involves identifying and eliminating unnecessary expenditures,
servicess.service-8-description: Comprehensive analyses conducted to evaluate various aspects of engineering projects. These studies aim to provide detailed insights, inform decision-making, and ensure the feasibility, safety, and efficiency of a project.

service-8-features.1: Gather & review all necessary engineering documents
service-8-features.3: Check the performance of building and equipment

servicess.service-9-description: Refers to the art and practice of designing and arranging outdoor spaces, including gardens, parks, and other natural environments, to enhance their aesthetic appeal, functionality, and environmental value. plants, hardscapes, and structures to create pleasing and functional outdoor areas.

slide to select the space of the service: slide to select the space of the services in m².
team_text: With years of experience collaborating with organizations across Saudi Arabia, our team has cultivated a deep, industry-specific knowledge base. Our projects are delivered by seasoned professionals with specialized expertise across key functional areas. Each team member is dedicated to providing high-quality, tailored services that align with our clients' goals contributing to the sustainable, innovative, and enduring success of every project.
